languageSelection.pleaseAccept: Please read and accept the legal documents
languageSelection.legalSummary:
By using the TacticIQ platform, you accept the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and KVKK Disclosure.

• Your personal data will be processed under KVKK/GDPR
• No right of withdrawal for digital content sales
• Virtual items have no cash value
• Parental consent required for users under 13

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. INTRODUCTION
These Terms govern your use of TacticIQ platform.

2. VIRTUAL ITEMS
Points, XP are virtual, non-refundable, no cash value.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All rights belong to TacticIQ.

4. WITHDRAWAL
No withdrawal for digital content.

5. CONTACT
legal@tacticiq.app

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. DATA COLLECTION
We process device ID, IP, location and activity data.

2. REGIONAL RIGHTS

TURKEY (KVKK):
Data Controller: TacticIQ

EUROPE (GDPR):
Right to delete, transfer data.

USA (CCPA/COPPA):
Under 13 requires parental consent.

3. CONTACT
privacy@tacticiq.app

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. USAGE
We use cookies to improve experience.

2. TYPES
- Essential
- Functional
- Analytics
- Marketing

3. MANAGEMENT
Settings menu

kvkk.title: KVKK Disclosure
kvkk.fullContent:
DATA CONTROLLER: TacticIQ
kvkk@tacticiq.app

DATA PROCESSED:
- Identity
- Contact
- Activity
- Device/IP

PURPOSES:
- Service
- Improvement
- Security

RIGHTS:
kvkk@tacticiq.app

consent.fullContent:
DISCLOSURE:
I am informed
I know purposes
I know my rights

CONSENT:

WITHDRAWAL:

consent.title: Privacy Preferences
consent.subtitle: Choose how your data will be used
consent.kvkkInfo: We care about your privacy. These preferences are protected under KVKK.
consent.gdprInfo: We care about your privacy. These preferences are protected under GDPR.
consent.ccpaInfo: We care about your privacy. These preferences are protected under CCPA.
consent.defaultInfo: Set your preferences to protect your data.
consent.essentialDesc: Required for the app to function. Cannot be disabled.
consent.analyticsDesc: Used to analyze and improve app performance.
consent.marketingDesc: Allows us to send notifications about campaigns and special offers.
consent.personalizedAdsDesc: Allows us to show you ads based on your interests.
consent.dataTransferDesc: Explicit consent required for transferring your data to servers abroad under KVKK.
consent.privacyPolicyLink: Review our Privacy Policy for details
consent.childModeRestriction: These features are disabled in child mode for safety.
consent.saveError: Your preferences could not be saved. Please try again.
consent.saveSuccess: Your preferences have been saved successfully!
